fullText: Christine Ebersole delivers a tour-de-force performance, playing both the young socialite Edith Bouvier Beale and her elderly, eccentric self with remarkable skill and poignancy.
dtliExcerpt: Christine Ebersole delivers a tour-de-force performance, playing both the young socialite Edith Bouvier Beale and her elderly, eccentric self with remarkable skill and poignancy.
